From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>



* Tears still fell from her optics as she held Prowl close to her, their 
lips remaining locked in possably their last kiss.
It was hard for Iron Raptor to believe that any moment he would be gone, 
forever.
Her spark was completely broken, her spirits were none.
She was just about to pull away when she heard the sharp intake of breath, 
her optics widening suddenly as she seen coils come from Prowl's chest.
She knew what those were, REPAIR coils!
Suddenly a new spark of hope came to life, as she felt Prowl's arm come 
around her and held her to him...it only grew.
He was alive, and beginning to repair! Everything would be alright!
Iron Raptor watched as Prowl closed his eyes in pain from the movement, 
leaning his head back and meeting her worried and loving gaze with his own.
She listened to his hushed words, a warm smile forming on her lips as more 
tears trickled from her optics...but of joy.*

" I love you too."

* Her own voice was quiet as she held Prowl closer to her, leaninf her own 
back against the wall and simply staying there and holding her only love.
She would stay there with him, keeping him in her arms until she was 
completely sure that he was alright.*
